short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to preview and debug opengraph and social sharing images and tags

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See how Open Graph & Twitter cards look from anywhere in your current tab.

Whether you're a developer working locally or just browsing the web, OG Preview helps you understand how webpages present themselves on social media platforms.
Key Features:

â€¢ Instant previews for Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn
â€¢ Check Twitter card types (summary_large_image or summary)
â€¢ View Open Graph & meta tags in a clear table format
â€¢ Identify missing tags at a glance

Perfect for:

â€¢ Debugging metadata during local development
â€¢ Previewing changes before deployment
â€¢ Analyzing how other websites optimize their social sharing

How it works:

â€¢ Click the extension icon on any webpage
â€¢ View platform-specific previews in separate tabs
â€¢ Check the tag table to see what's present and what's missing

Give it a try and see how your pages (or any site you visit) will look when shared across the social web. Your feedback is welcome and helps improve the extension ðŸ‘‡!
